name: Rajesh Maharjan
testimonial: The computer engineering program at SNMV gave me the foundation I needed to succeed in the tech industry. The hands-on experience and quality teaching prepared me for real-world challenges.

name: Priya Sharma
testimonial: SNMV's technical education program opened doors to opportunities I never imagined. The OJT program was particularly valuable in gaining real industry experience.

name: Anil Thapa
testimonial: The strong foundation in electronics and programming from SNMV helped me start my own tech company. The teachers were incredibly supportive throughout my journey.

name: Sita Gurung
testimonial: The practical approach to learning at SNMV made all the difference. I'm now working as a cybersecurity analyst and I owe my success to the solid foundation I received here.

name: Kumar Shrestha
testimonial: SNMV's computer engineering program prepared me not just technically, but also helped develop problem-solving skills that are essential in the tech field.

name: Bikash Rai
testimonial: The combination of theoretical knowledge and practical experience at SNMV gave me the confidence to pursue higher studies abroad and excel in my career.
